Keep what matters visible)

input.prompt:
Explore the OpenFang codebase thoroughly, focusing on:

1. The canvas system - how components are rendered, positioned, dragged, and managed. Look at all canvas-related JavaScript, ERB views, routes, models, and CSS.
2. The layout system - how the sidebar nav, chat terminal, and main content area are structured
3. The component/card system on the canvas - what types of components exist (pages, etc.)
4. Any context menu implementations
5. The current design system (CSS tokens, card styles, component styles)
6. How pages/content are created and displayed on the canvas

Key files to check: web/app.rb, web/views/layout.erb, web/views/canvas*.erb, web/public/css/style.css, any JS files related to canvas, fang/models/ for canvas-related models, fang/tools/create_page_tool.rb

Be very thorough - read all relevant files completely.

content.content:
1import { Controller } from "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@hotwired/stimulus@3.2.2/dist/stimulus.js"
     2
     3export default class extends Controller {
     4  static values = { pageId: Number, scrollLocked: { type: Boolean, default: false } }
     5
     6  connect() {
     7    this.scale = 1.0
     8    this.panX = 0
     9    this.panY = 0
    10    this.isPanning = false
    11    this.isDragging = false
    12    this.dragTarget = null
    13    this.startX = 0
    14    this.startY = 0
    15    this.startElX = 0
    16    this.startElY = 0
    17    this.scrollLock = this.scrollLockedValue
    18    this.editLock = false
    19
    20    this.world = this.element.querySelector(".canvas-world")
    21    if (!this.world) return
    22
    23    // Apply scroll lock class if initial value is true
    24    if (this.scrollLock) {
    25      this.element.classList.add("scroll-locked")
    26    }
    27
    28    // Bind events
    29    this.onMouseDown = this.onMouseDown.bind(this)
    30    this.onMouseMove = this.onMouseMove.bind(this)
    31    this.onMouseUp = this.onMouseUp.bind(this)
    32    this.onWheel = this.onWheel.bind(this)
    33
    34    this.element.addEventListener("mousedown", this.onMouseDown)
    35    document.addEventListener("mousemove", this.onMouseMove)
    36    document.addEventListener("mouseup", this.onMouseUp)
    37    this.element.addEventListener("wheel", this.onWheel, { passive: false })
    38
    39    // Touch events
    40    this.onTouchStart = this.onTouchStart.bind(this)
    41    this.onTouchMove = this.onTouchMove.bind(this)
    42    this.onTouchEnd = this.onTouchEnd.bind(this)
    43    this.element.addEventListener("touchstart", this.onTouchStart, { passive: false })
    44    document.addEventListener("touchmove", this.onTouchMove, { passive: false })
    45    document.addEventListener("touchend", this.onTouchEnd)
    46
    47    // Double-click to edit
    48    this.onDblClick = this.onDblClick.bind(this)
    49    this.element.addEventListener("dblclick", this.onDblClick)
    50
    51    // Context menu
    52    this.onContextMenu = this.onContextMenu.bind(this)
    53    this.onDocumentClick = this.onDocumentClick.bind(this)
    54    this.onKeyDown = this.onKeyDown.bind(this)
    55    this.element.addEventListener("contextmenu", this.onContextMenu)
    56    document.addEventListener("click", this.onDocumentClick)
    57    document.addEventListener("keydown", this.onKeyDown)
    58    this.menu = document.getElementById("canvas-context-menu")
    59    this.menuItems = document.getElementById("canvas-context-menu-items")
    60
    61    // Configurable menu item registries  built from widget types API
    62    this.canvasMenuItems = [
    63      { label: "Add Note", action: (wx, wy) => this.addWidget('card', wx, wy) },
    64      { separator: true },
    65      { label: () => this.scrollLock ? "Scroll Lock: On" : "Scroll Lock: Off", action: () => this.toggleScrollLock() },
    66      { label: () => this.editLock ? "Edit Lock: On" : "Edit Lock: Off", action: () => this.toggleEditLock() },
    67      { label: "Reset View", action: () => this.resetView() },
    68    ]
    69
    70    // Fetch widget types and rebuild menu dynamically
    71    this._loadWidgetTypes()
    72
    73    this.componentMenuItems = [
    74      { label: "Chat about this", action: (comp) => this.chatAboutComponent(comp) },
    75      { label: "Duplicate", action: (comp) => this.duplicateComponent(comp) },
    76      { separator: true },
    77      { label: "Delete", destructive: true, action: (comp) => this.deleteComponent(comp) },
    78    ]
    79
    80    // Expose for extensibility
    81    window.canvasController = this
    82
    83    // MutationObserver for Turbo Stream updates
    84    this.observer = new MutationObserver((mutations) => {
    85      for (const mutation of mutations) {
    86        for (const node of mutation.addedNodes) {
    87          if (node.classList?.contains("canvas-component")) {
    88            this.initComponent(node)
    89          }
    90        }
    91        for (const node of mutation.removedNodes) {
    92          if (node.classList?.contains("canvas-component")) {
    93            this.destroyComponent(node)
    94          }
    95        }
    96      }
    97    })
    98    this.observer.observe(this.world, { childList: true })
    99
   100    // Init existing components
   101    this.world.querySelectorAll(".canvas-component").forEach(c => this.initComponent(c))
   102
   103    this.updateTransform()
   104    this.updateZoomIndicator()
   105  }
   106
   107  disconnect() {
   108    this.element.removeEventListener("mousedown", this.onMouseDown)
   109    document.removeEventListener("mousemove", this.onMouseMove)
   110    document.removeEventListener("mouseup", this.onMouseUp)
   111    this.element.removeEventListener("wheel", this.onWheel)
   112    this.element.removeEventListener("touchstart", this.onTouchStart)
   113    document.removeEventListener("touchmove", this.onTouchMove)
   114    document.removeEventListener("touchend", this.onTouchEnd)
   115    this.element.removeEventListener("dblclick", this.onDblClick)
   116    this.element.removeEventListener("contextmenu", this.onContextMenu)
   117    document.removeEventListener("click", this.onDocumentClick)
   118    document.removeEventListener("keydown", this.onKeyDown)
   119    this.observer?.disconnect()
   120    if (window.canvasController === this) window.canvasController = null
   121  }
   122
   123  initComponent(el) {
   124    el.style.zIndex = el.dataset.z || 0
   125    const type = el.dataset.widgetType
   126    if (type && window.widgetBehaviors?.[type]?.init) {
   127      try {
   128        const meta = JSON.parse(el.dataset.widgetMetadata || '{}')
   129        window.widgetBehaviors[type].init(el, meta)
   130      } catch (e) {
   131        console.error(`[Canvas] Widget init failed for ${type}:`, e)
   132      }
   133    }
   134  }
   135
   136  destroyComponent(el) {
   137    const type = el.dataset.widgetType
   138    if (type && window.widgetBehaviors?.[type]?.destroy) {
   139      try {
   140        window.widgetBehaviors[type].destroy(el)
   141      } catch (e) {
   142        console.error(`[Canvas] Widget destroy failed for ${type}:`, e)
   143      }
   144    }
   145  }
   146
   147  // --- Double-click to Edit ---
   148
   149  onDblClick(e) {
   150    const component = e.target.closest(".canvas-component")
   151    if (!component) return
   152
   153    const contentEl = component.querySelector(".canvas-component-content")
   154    if (!contentEl || contentEl.isContentEditable) return
   155
   156    // Enter edit mode
   157    this.editingComponent = component
   158    contentEl.contentEditable = "true"
   159    contentEl.style.cursor = "text"
   160    contentEl.style.userSelect = "text"
   161    component.style.cursor = "auto"
   162    contentEl.focus()
   163
   164    // Select all text
   165    const range = document.createRange()
   166    range.selectNodeContents(contentEl)
   167    const sel = window.getSelection()
   168    sel.removeAllRanges()
   169    sel.addRange(range)
   170
   171    // Save on blur
   172    const onBlur = () => {
   173      contentEl.removeEventListener("blur", onBlur)
   174      contentEl.removeEventListener("keydown", onKeyDown)
   175      this.finishEditing(component, contentEl)
   176    }
   177
   178    // Escape cancels, Cmd/Ctrl+Enter confirms
   179    const onKeyDown = (ev) => {
   180      if (ev.key === "Escape") {
   181        ev.preventDefault()
   182        contentEl.removeEventListener("blur", onBlur)
   183        contentEl.removeEventListener("keydown", onKeyDown)
   184        this.finishEditing(component, contentEl)
   185      }
   186    }
   187
   188    contentEl.addEventListener("blur", onBlur)
   189    contentEl.addEventListener("keydown", onKeyDown)
   190
   191    e.preventDefault()
   192    e.stopPropagation()
   193  }
   194
   195  finishEditing(component, contentEl) {
   196    contentEl.contentEditable = "false"
   197    contentEl.style.cursor = ""
   198    contentEl.style.userSelect = ""
   199    component.style.cursor = "grab"
   200    this.editingComponent = null
   201
   202    // Persist updated content
   203    const compId = component.dataset.componentId
   204    const pageId = this.pageIdValue
   205    if (!compId || !pageId) return
   206
   207    const newContent = contentEl.innerHTML
   208    fetch(`/api/pages/${pageId}/components/${compId}`, {
   209      method: "PATCH",
   210      headers: { "Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" },
   211      body: `content=${encodeURIComponent(newContent)}`
   212    }).catch(e => console.error("[Canvas] Failed to save content:", e))
   213  }
   214
   215  // --- Context Menu ---
   216
   217  onContextMenu(e) {
   218    e.preventDefault()
   219    const component = e.target.closest(".canvas-component")
   220    if (component) {
   221      this.showComponentMenu(e.clientX, e.clientY, component)
   222    } else {
   223      const rect = this.element.getBoundingClientRect()
   224      const worldX = (e.clientX - rect.left - this.panX) / this.scale
   225      const worldY = (e.clientY - rect.top - this.panY) / this.scale
   226      this.showCanvasMenu(e.clientX, e.clientY, worldX, worldY)
   227    }
   228  }
   229
   230  showCanvasMenu(screenX, screenY, worldX, worldY) {
   231    this.menuItems.innerHTML = ""
   232    for (const item of this.canvasMenuItems) {
   233      if (item.separator) {
   234        this.menuItems.appendChild(Object.assign(document.createElement("div"), { className: "canvas-context-menu-separator" }))
   235      } else {
   236        const label = typeof item.label === "function" ? item.label() : item.label
   237        const btn = document.createElement("button")
   238        btn.className = "canvas-context-menu-item"
   239        btn.textContent = label
   240        btn.addEventListener("click", () => { this.hideMenu(); item.action(worldX, worldY) })
   241        this.menuItems.appendChild(btn)
   242      }
   243    }
   244    this.positionAndShowMenu(screenX, screenY)
   245  }
   246
   247  showComponentMenu(screenX, screenY, component) {
   248    this.menuItems.innerHTML = ""
   249    for (const item of this.componentMenuItems) {
   250      if (item.separator) {
   251        this.menuItems.appendChild(Object.assign(document.createElement("div"), { className: "canvas-context-menu-separator" }))
   252      } else {
   253        const label = typeof item.label === "function" ? item.label() : item.label
   254        const btn = document.createElement("button")
   255        btn.className = "canvas-context-menu-item" + (item.destructive ? " destructive" : "")
   256        btn.textContent = label
   257        btn.addEventListener("click", () => { this.hideMenu(); item.action(component) })
   258        this.menuItems.appendChild(btn)
   259      }
   260    }
   261    this.positionAndShowMenu(screenX, screenY)
   262  }
   263
   264  positionAndShowMenu(x, y) {
   265    this.menu.style.display = "block"
   266    // Avoid viewport overflow
   267    const menuRect = this.menu.getBoundingClientRect()
   268    if (x + menuRect.width > window.innerWidth) x = window.innerWidth - menuRect.width - 8
   269    if (y + menuRect.height > window.innerHeight) y = window.innerHeight - menuRect.height - 8
   270    this.menu.style.left = x + "px"
   271    this.menu.style.top = y + "px"
   272  }
   273
   274  hideMenu() {
   275    if (this.menu) this.menu.style.display = "none"
   276  }
   277
   278  onDocumentClick(e) {
   279    if (this.menu && !this.menu.contains(e.target)) this.hideMenu()
   280  }
   281
   282  onKeyDown(e) {
   283    if (e.key === "Escape") this.hideMenu()
   284  }
   285
   286  // --- Context Menu Actions ---
   287
   288  async createComponent(attrs) {
   289    const pageId = this.pageIdValue
   290    if (!pageId) return null
   291    try {
   292      const resp = await fetch(`/api/pages/${pageId}/components`, {
   293        method: "POST",
   294        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
   295        body: JSON.stringify(attrs)
   296      })
   297      return await resp.json()
   298    } catch (e) {
   299      console.error("[Canvas] Failed to create component:", e)
   300      return null
   301    }
   302  }
   303
   304  addWidget(type, x, y, metadata = {}) {
   305    const widgetType = this._widgetTypes?.find(w => w.type === type)
   306    const defaults = widgetType?.defaults || {}
   307    this.createComponent({
   308      component_type: type,
   309      x, y,
   310      width: type === 'card' ? 240 : 280,
   311      metadata: { ...defaults, ...metadata }
   312    })
   313  }
   314
   315  async _loadWidgetTypes() {
   316    try {
   317      const resp = await fetch('/api/widget_types')
   318      const data = await resp.json()
   319      this._widgetTypes = data.widget_types || []
   320
   321      // Rebuild canvas menu: widget items + separator + utility items
   322      const widgetItems = this._widgetTypes.map(w => ({
   323        label: w.label,
   324        action: (wx, wy) => this.addWidget(w.type, wx, wy)
   325      }))
   326
   327      const utilityItems = [
   328        { label: () => this.scrollLock ? "Scroll Lock: On" : "Scroll Lock: Off", action: () => this.toggleScrollLock() },
   329        { label: () => this.editLock ? "Edit Lock: On" : "Edit Lock: Off", action: () => this.toggleEditLock() },
   330        { label: "Reset View", action: () => this.resetView() },
   331      ]
   332
   333      this.canvasMenuItems = [...widgetItems, { separator: true }, ...utilityItems]
   334    } catch (e) {
   335      console.warn("[Canvas] Failed to load widget types, using defaults:", e)
   336    }
   337  }
   338
   339  async chatAboutComponent(comp) {
   340    const compId = comp.dataset.componentId
   341    const content = comp.querySelector(".canvas-component-content")?.textContent?.trim() || ""
   342    const preview = content.substring(0, 120)
   343    const pageId = this.pageIdValue
   344    const footer = window.chatFooter
   345
   346    if (!footer || !pageId) return
   347
   348    // Highlight the component on the canvas
   349    comp.classList.add("canvas-component-highlight")
   350    setTimeout(() => comp.classList.remove("canvas-component-highlight"), 2000)
   351
   352    // Derive a title from the component content
   353    const firstLine = content.split("\n").find(l => l.trim()) || ""
   354    const title = firstLine.substring(0, 50) || `Widget #${compId}`
   355
   356    // Create a new conversation in this canvas with the widget title
   357    try {
   358      const resp = await fetch("/api/conversations", {
   359        method: "POST",
   360        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" },
   361        body: `ai_page_id=${pageId}&title=${encodeURIComponent(title)}`
   362      })
   363      const data = await resp.json()
   364
   365      // Ensure the canvas is open, then open the new conversation
   366      const canvas = footer.canvases.find(c => c.pageId === pageId)
   367      if (canvas) {
   368        footer.openConversation(data.id, data.title, data.slug, pageId)
   369      } else {
   370        footer.openCanvas(pageId, title, "", data.id, data.title, data.slug)
   371      }
   372
   373      // Prefill the textarea with a reference to the component
   374      const prefill = `[Re: canvas widget #${compId}]\n"${preview}"\n\n`
   375      const tryPrefill = (attempts) => {
   376        const panel = document.querySelector(".chat-panel.active")
   377        const textarea = panel?.querySelector("textarea")
   378        if (textarea) {
   379          textarea.value = prefill
   380          textarea.focus()
   381          textarea.setSelectionRange(prefill.length, prefill.length)
   382        } else if (attempts > 0) {
   383          setTimeout(() => tryPrefill(attempts - 1), 200)
   384        }
   385      }
   386      tryPrefill(5)
   387    } catch (e) {
   388      console.error("[Canvas] Failed to create conversation for component:", e)
   389    }
   390  }
   391
   392  async duplicateComponent(comp) {
   393    const compId = comp.dataset.componentId
   394    const pageId = this.pageIdValue
   395    if (!compId || !pageId) return
   396
   397    try {
   398      const resp = await fetch(`/api/pages/${pageId}/components/${compId}`)
   399      const data = await resp.json()
   400      this.createComponent({
   401        component_type: data.type,
   402        content: data.content,
   403        x: (data.x || 0) + 24,
   404        y: (data.y || 0) + 24,
   405        width: data.width,
   406        height: data.height,
   407        z_index: data.z_index,
   408        metadata: data.metadata
   409      })
   410    } catch (e) {
   411      console.error("[Canvas] Failed to duplicate component:", e)
   412    }
   413  }
   414
   415  async deleteComponent(comp) {
   416    const compId = comp.dataset.componentId
   417    const pageId = this.pageIdValue
   418    if (!compId || !pageId) return
   419
   420    // Clean up widget behavior before removal
   421    this.destroyComponent(comp)
   422    comp.remove()
   423
   424    try {
   425      await fetch(`/api/pages/${pageId}/components/${compId}`, { method: "DELETE" })
   426    } catch (e) {
   427      console.error("[Canvas] Failed to delete component:", e)
   428    }
   429  }
   430
   431  toggleScrollLock() {
   432    this.scrollLock = !this.scrollLock
   433    this.element.classList.toggle("scroll-locked", this.scrollLock)
   434    this.updateZoomIndicator()
   435  }
   436
   437  toggleEditLock() {
   438    this.editLock = !this.editLock
   439    this.element.classList.toggle("edit-locked", this.editLock)
   440    this.updateZoomIndicator()
   441  }
   442
   443  updateScrollLockIndicator() {
   444    // Merged into updateZoomIndicator
   445    this.updateZoomIndicator()
   446  }
   447
   448  resetView() {
   449    this.scale = 1.0
   450    this.panX = 0
   451    this.panY = 0
   452    this.updateTransform()
   453    this.updateZoomIndicator()
   454  }
   455
   456  // --- Pan & Drag (Mouse) ---
   457
   458  onMouseDown(e) {
   459    if (e.button !== 0) return // Only primary (left) button
   460    // Don't drag while editing
   461    if (this.editingComponent) return
   462    const component = e.target.closest(".canvas-component")
   463    if (component && this.editLock) {
   464      // Edit lock: let the event pass through for normal HTML behavior
   465      return
   466    }
   467    if (component) {
   468      // Start dragging component (works in both normal and scroll-lock mode)
   469      this.isDragging = true
   470      this.dragTarget = component
   471      this.startX = e.clientX
   472      this.startY = e.clientY
   473      this.startElX = parseFloat(component.style.left) || 0
   474      this.startElY = parseFloat(component.style.top) || 0
   475      component.classList.add("dragging")
   476      e.preventDefault()
   477    } else if (!this.scrollLock && (e.target === this.element || e.target === this.world || e.target.classList.contains("canvas-dot-grid"))) {
   478      // Start panning (disabled in scroll-lock mode)
   479      this.isPanning = true
   480      this.startX = e.clientX
   481      this.startY = e.clientY
   482      this.startPanX = this.panX
   483      this.startPanY = this.panY
   484      this.element.style.cursor = "grabbing"
   485      e.preventDefault()
   486    }
   487  }
   488
   489  onMouseMove(e) {
   490    if (this.isPanning) {
   491      this.panX = this.startPanX + (e.clientX - this.startX)
   492      this.panY = this.startPanY + (e.clientY - this.startY)
   493      this.updateTransform()
   494    } else if (this.isDragging && this.dragTarget) {
   495      const dx = (e.clientX - this.startX) / this.scale
   496      const dy = (e.clientY - this.startY) / this.scale
   497      this.dragTarget.style.left = (this.startElX + dx) + "px"
   498      this.dragTarget.style.top = (this.startElY + dy) + "px"
   499    }
   500  }
   501
   502  onMouseUp(e) {
   503    if (this.isPanning) {
   504      this.isPanning = false
   505      this.element.style.cursor = ""
   506    }
   507    if (this.isDragging && this.dragTarget) {
   508      this.dragTarget.classList.remove("dragging")
   509      this.saveComponentPosition(this.dragTarget)
   510      this.isDragging = false
   511      this.dragTarget = null
   512    }
   513  }
   514
   515  // --- Touch ---
   516
   517  onTouchStart(e) {
   518    if (e.touches.length !== 1) return
   519    const touch = e.touches[0]
   520    const component = touch.target.closest(".canvas-component")
   521    if (component && this.editLock) {
   522      // Edit lock: let the event pass through for normal HTML behavior
   523      return
   524    }
   525    if (component) {
   526      // Allow dragging in both normal and scroll-lock mode
   527      this.isDragging = true
   528      this.dragTarget = component
   529      this.startX = touch.clientX
   530      this.startY = touch.clientY
   531      this.startElX = parseFloat(component.style.left) || 0
   532      this.startElY = parseFloat(component.style.top) || 0
   533      component.classList.add("dragging")
   534      e.preventDefault()
   535    } else if (!this.scrollLock) {
   536      this.isPanning = true
   537      this.startX = touch.clientX
   538      this.startY = touch.clientY
   539      this.startPanX = this.panX
   540      this.startPanY = this.panY
   541      e.preventDefault()
   542    }
   543  }
   544
   545  onTouchMove(e) {
   546    if (e.touches.length !== 1) return
   547    const touch = e.touches[0]
   548    if (this.isPanning) {
   549      this.panX = this.startPanX + (touch.clientX - this.startX)
   550      this.panY = this.startPanY + (touch.clientY - this.startY)
   551      this.updateTransform()
   552    } else if (this.isDragging && this.dragTarget) {
   553      const dx = (touch.clientX - this.startX) / this.scale
   554      const dy = (touch.clientY - this.startY) / this.scale
   555      this.dragTarget.style.left = (this.startElX + dx) + "px"
   556      this.dragTarget.style.top = (this.startElY + dy) + "px"
   557      e.preventDefault()
   558    }
   559  }
   560
   561  onTouchEnd() {
   562    if (this.isPanning) this.isPanning = false
   563    if (this.isDragging && this.dragTarget) {
   564      this.dragTarget.classList.remove("dragging")
   565      this.saveComponentPosition(this.dragTarget)
   566      this.isDragging = false
   567      this.dragTarget = null
   568    }
   569  }
   570
   571  // --- Zoom ---
   572
   573  onWheel(e) {
   574    e.preventDefault()
   575
   576    if (this.scrollLock) {
   577      // Scroll lock: wheel scrolls vertically (pans Y only)
   578      this.panY -= e.deltaY
   579      this.updateTransform()
   580      return
   581    }
   582
   583    const delta = e.deltaY > 0 ? -0.08 : 0.08
   584    const newScale = Math.min(Math.max(this.scale + delta, 0.1), 3.0)
   585
   586    // Zoom toward cursor
   587    const rect = this.element.getBoundingClientRect()
   588    const cx = e.clientX - rect.left
   589    const cy = e.clientY - rect.top
   590
   591    const ratio = newScale / this.scale
   592    this.panX = cx - ratio * (cx - this.panX)
   593    this.panY = cy - ratio * (cy - this.panY)
   594    this.scale = newScale
   595
   596    this.updateTransform()
   597    this.updateZoomIndicator()
   598  }
   599
   600  updateTransform() {
   601    if (this.world) {
   602      this.world.style.transform = `translate(${this.panX}px, ${this.panY}px) scale(${this.scale})`
   603      this.world.style.width = ""
   604      this.world.style.height = ""
   605    }
   606  }
   607
   608  updateZoomIndicator() {
   609    const indicator = this.element.querySelector(".canvas-zoom-indicator")
   610    if (!indicator) return
   611
   612    const zoom = Math.round(this.scale * 100) + "%"
   613
   614    // SVG icons (14px, stroke-based, 1.5px stroke)
   615    const scrollIcon = `<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="14" height="14" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M12 3v18"/><path d="m8 6 4-3 4 3"/><path d="m8 18 4 3 4-3"/></svg>`
   616    const editLockOffIcon = `<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="14" height="14" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M5 9l4-4 4 4"/><path d="M9 5v10"/><path d="M19 15l-4 4-4-4"/><path d="M15 19V9"/></svg>`
   617    const editLockOnIcon = `<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="14" height="14" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><rect x="3" y="11" width="18" height="11" rx="2" ry="2"/><path d="M7 11V7a5 5 0 0 1 10 0v4"/></svg>`
   618
   619    indicator.innerHTML = `<span>${zoom}</span><button class="canvas-toolbar-btn${this.scrollLock ? ' active' : ''}" title="Toggle scroll lock">${scrollIcon}</button><button class="canvas-toolbar-btn${this.editLock ? ' active' : ''}" title="Toggle edit lock">${this.editLock ? editLockOnIcon : editLockOffIcon}</button>`
   620    indicator.style.pointerEvents = "auto"
   621
   622    const buttons = indicator.querySelectorAll(".canvas-toolbar-btn")
   623    buttons[0].onclick = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); this.toggleScrollLock() }
   624    buttons[1].onclick = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); this.toggleEditLock() }
   625  }
   626
   627  // --- Persist position ---
   628
   629  async saveComponentPosition(el) {
   630    const componentId = el.dataset.componentId
   631    const pageId = this.pageIdValue
   632    if (!componentId || !pageId) return
   633
   634    const x = parseFloat(el.style.left) || 0
   635    const y = parseFloat(el.style.top) || 0
   636
   637    try {
   638      await fetch(`/api/pages/${pageId}/components/${componentId}`, {
   639        method: "PATCH",
   640        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" },
   641        body: `x=${x}&y=${y}`
   642      })
   643    } catch (e) {
   644      console.error("[Canvas] Failed to save position:", e)
   645    }
   646
   647  }
   648}
   649

data.prompt:
Explore the OpenFang codebase thoroughly, focusing on:

1. The canvas system - how components are rendered, positioned, dragged, and managed. Look at all canvas-related JavaScript, ERB views, routes, models, and CSS.
2. The layout system - how the sidebar nav, chat terminal, and main content area are structured
3. The component/card system on the canvas - what types of components exist (pages, etc.)
4. Any context menu implementations
5. The current design system (CSS tokens, card styles, component styles)
6. How pages/content are created and displayed on the canvas

Key files to check: web/app.rb, web/views/layout.erb, web/views/canvas*.erb, web/public/css/style.css, any JS files related to canvas, fang/models/ for canvas-related models, fang/tools/create_page_tool.rb

Be very thorough - read all relevant files completely.

}], activeConvId } 9 this.canvases = [] 10 this.activeCanvasPageId = null 11 this.activeEventSource = null // single SSE connection for active canvas 12 this.footerHeight = back/forward 42 window.addEventListener("popstate", () => this._handlePopState()) 43 } 44 45 disconnect() { 46 if (this.activeEventSource) { 47 this.activeEventSource.close() 48 this.activeEventSource = null 49 } 50 window.chatFooter = null 51 } 52 53 // --- Canvas Tab Management --- 54 55 async newTab() { 56 try { 57 const resp = await fetch("/api/canvases", { 58 method: "POST", 59 headers: { console.error("[ChatFooter] Failed to create canvas:", e) 65 } 66 } 67 68 openCanvas(pageId, title, slug, convId, convTitle, convSlug) { 69 let canvas = this.canvases.find(c => c.pageId === pageId) 70 if (convId) { 92 this.openConversation(convId, convTitle, convSlug, pageId) 93 } else if (canvas.conversations.length === 0) { 94 this.newConversation() 95 } 96 } 97 98 switchCanvas(pageId) { 99 // Switch SSE to new active canvas 100 if (this.activeCanvasPageId !== pageId) { 101 if (this.activeEventSource) { 102 this.activeEventSource.close() 103 this.activeEventSource = null 104 } 105 this.connectSSE(pageId) 106 } 107 108 this.activeCanvasPageId = pageId 109 const canvas = this.canvases.find(c => c.pageId === pageId) 110 111 // Update canvas tab buttons 112 this.canvasTabsTarget.querySelectorAll(".chat-tab").forEach(tab => { 113 tab.classList.toggle("active", parseInt(tab.dataset.pageId) === pageId) 114 }) 115 116 // Update canvas overlays 117 const canvasesEl = document.getElementById("conversation-canvases") 118 if (canvasesEl) { 119 canvasesEl.querySelectorAll(".conversation-canvas").forEach(c => { 120 c.classList.toggle("active", c.id === `canvas-page-${pageId}`) 121 }) 122 } 123 124 // Render conversation tabs for active canvas 125 this._renderConversationTabs() 126 127 // Show/hide conversation tab bar 128 if (canvas) { 129 this.conversationTabBarTarget.style.display = "" 130 } 131 132 // Switch to active conversation in this canvas 133 if (canvas && canvas.activeConvId) { 134 this._activateConversation(canvas.activeConvId) 135 } 136 137 this._saveState() 138 this._updateURL() 139 } 140 141 closeCanvas(pageId) { 142 const canvas = this.canvases.find(c => c.pageId === pageId) 143 if (!canvas) return 144 145 // Close SSE if this was the active canvas 146 if (this.activeCanvasPageId === pageId && this.activeEventSource) { 147 this.activeEventSource.close() 148 this.activeEventSource = null 149 } 150 151 // Remove all conversation panels 152 for (const conv of canvas.conversations) { 153 const panel = this.panelsTarget.querySelector(`[data-panel-id="${conv.id}"]`) 154 if (panel) panel.remove() 155 } 156 157 // Remove canvas tab button 158 const tab = this.canvasTabsTarget.querySelector(`[data-page-id="${pageId}"]`) 159 if (tab) tab.remove() 160 161 // Remove canvas overlay 162 const overlay = document.getElementById(`canvas-page-${pageId}`) 163 if (overlay) overlay.remove() 164 165 // Update state 166 this.canvases = this.canvases.filter(c => c.pageId !== pageId) 167 this._saveState() 168 169 // Switch to another canvas or collapse 170 if (this.activeCanvasPageId === pageId) { 171 if (this.canvases.length > 0) { 172 this.switchCanvas(this.canvases[this.canvases.length - 1].pageId) 173 } else { 174 this.activeCanvasPageId = null 175 this.element.style.height = "auto" 176 this.conversationTabBarTarget.style.display = "none" 177 this._clearConversationTabs() 178 const canvasesEl = document.getElementById("conversation-canvases") 179 if (canvasesEl) { 180 canvasesEl.querySelectorAll(".conversation-canvas").forEach(c => c.classList.remove("active")) 181 } 182 this._updateURL() 183 } 184 } 185 } 186 187 // --- Conversation Tab Management --- 188 189 async newConversation() { 190 const canvas = this.canvases.find(c => c.pageId === this.activeCanvasPageId) 191 if (!canvas) return 192 193 try { 194 const resp = await fetch("/api/conversations", { 195 method: "POST", 196 headers: { "Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" }, 197 body: `ai_page_id=${canvas.pageId}` 198 }) 199 const data = await resp.json() 200 this.openConversation(data.id, data.title, data.slug, canvas.pageId) 201 } catch (e) { 202 console.error("[ChatFooter] Failed to create conversation:", e) 203 } 204 } 205 206 openConversation(convId, title, slug, pageId) { 207 const canvas = this.canvases.find(c => c.pageId === pageId) 208 if (!canvas) return 209 210 // Don't duplicate 211 if (canvas.conversations.find(c => c.id === convId)) { 212 this.switchConversation(convId) 213 return 214 } 215 216 canvas.conversations.push({ id: convId, title, slug }) 217 218 // Create panel 219 const panel = document.createElement("div") 220 panel.className = "chat-panel" 221 panel.dataset.panelId = convId 222 panel.innerHTML = `
Loading...
` 223 this.panelsTarget.appendChild(panel) 224 225 // Load panel content 226 this._loadPanel(convId, panel) 227 228 // If this canvas is active, re-render conversation tabs and switch 229 if (this.activeCanvasPageId === pageId) { 230 this._renderConversationTabs() 231 this.switchConversation(convId) 232 } 233 234 this._saveState() 235 } 236 237 switchConversation(convId) { 238 const canvas = this.canvases.find(c => c.pageId === this.activeCanvasPageId) 239 if (!canvas) return 240 241 canvas.activeConvId = convId 242 this._activateConversation(convId) 243 this._saveState() 244 this._updateURL() 245 } 246 247 closeConversation(convId) { 248 const canvas = this.canvases.find(c => c.conversations.some(cv => cv.id === convId)) 249 if (!canvas) return 250 251 // Remove panel 252 const panel = this.panelsTarget.querySelector(`[data-panel-id="${convId}"]`) 253 if (panel) panel.remove() 254 255 // Remove from state 256 canvas.conversations = canvas.conversations.filter(c => c.id !== convId) 257 258 // If it was the active conversation, switch to another or close canvas 259 if (canvas.activeConvId === convId) { 260 if (canvas.conversations.length > 0) { 261 canvas.activeConvId = canvas.conversations[canvas.conversations.length - 1].id 262 } else { 263 canvas.activeConvId = null 264 // Close the canvas if no conversations left 265 this.closeCanvas(canvas.pageId) 266 return 267 } 268 } 269 270 if (this.activeCanvasPageId === canvas.pageId) { 271 this._renderConversationTabs() 272 if (canvas.activeConvId) { 273 this._activateConversation(canvas.activeConvId) 274 } 275 } 276 277 this._saveState() 278 this._updateURL() 279 } 280 281 // --- SSE --- 282 283 connectSSE(pageId) { 284 if (this.activeEventSource) { 285 this.activeEventSource.close() 286 } 287 288 const source = new EventSource(`/api/pages/${pageId}/stream`) 289 source.onmessage = (event) => { 290 window.Turbo.renderStreamMessage(event.data) 291 // Auto-scroll any visible message panel for this canvas 292 const canvas = this.canvases.find(c => c.pageId === pageId) 293 if (canvas && canvas.activeConvId) { 294 // Remove thinking indicator 295 const thinking = document.getElementById(`thinking-${canvas.activeConvId}`) 296 if (thinking) thinking.remove() 297 298 const msgs = document.getElementById(`messages-${canvas.activeConvId}`) 299 if (msgs) { 300 requestAnimationFrame(() => { msgs.scrollTop = msgs.scrollHeight }) 301 } 302 } 303 } 304 source.onerror = () => { 305 console.warn(`[ChatFooter] SSE error for canvas ${pageId}, reconnecting...`) 306 } 307 this.activeEventSource = source 308 } 309 310 // --- Message Sending --- 311 312 async sendMessage(event) { 313 event.preventDefault() 314 const form = event.target 315 const textarea = form.querySelector("textarea") 316 const content = textarea.value.trim() 317 if (!content) return 318 319 const conversationId = form.querySelector("[name=conversation_id]").value 320 321 // Append user message immediately 322 const messagesEl = document.getElementById(`messages-${conversationId}`) 323 if (messagesEl) { 324 const emptyState = messagesEl.querySelector(".py-12.text-center") 325 if (emptyState) emptyState.remove() 326 327 const msgDiv = document.createElement("div") 328 msgDiv.className = "chat-msg user" 329 msgDiv.innerHTML = ` 330
331 YOU 332 ${new Date().toLocaleTimeString([], { hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' })} 333
334

${this.escapeHtml(content)}

335 ` 336 messagesEl.appendChild(msgDiv) 337 requestAnimationFrame(() => { messagesEl.scrollTop = messagesEl.scrollHeight }) 338 } 339 340 textarea.value = "" 341 textarea.style.height = "auto" 342 343 // Show AI thinking indicator 344 if (messagesEl) { 345 const thinkingDiv = document.createElement("div") 346 thinkingDiv.className = "ai-thinking" 347 thinkingDiv.id = `thinking-${conversationId}` 348 thinkingDiv.innerHTML = ` 349
350
351
352
353
354 ` 355 messagesEl.appendChild(thinkingDiv) 356 requestAnimationFrame(() => { messagesEl.scrollTop = messagesEl.scrollHeight }) 357 } 358 359 try { 360 await fetch(`/conversations/${conversationId}/messages`, { 361 method: "POST", 362 headers: { "Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" }, 363 body: `content=${encodeURIComponent(content)}` 364 }) 365 } catch (e) { 366 console.error("[ChatFooter] Failed to send message:", e) 367 } 368 } 369 370 handleKeydown(event) { 371 if (event.key === "Enter" && !event.shiftKey) { 372 event.preventDefault() 373 event.target.closest("form").requestSubmit() 374 } 375 } 376 377 autoResize(event) { 378 const textarea = event.target 379 textarea.style.height = "auto" 380 textarea.style.height = Math.min(textarea.scrollHeight, 120) + "px" 381 } 382 383 // --- Resize --- 384 385 startResize(event) { 386 event.preventDefault() 387 const startY = event.type === "touchstart" ? event.touches[0].clientY : event.clientY 388 const startHeight = this.element.offsetHeight 389 390 const onMove = (e) => { 391 const currentY = e.type === "touchmove" ? e.touches[0].clientY : e.clientY 392 const newHeight = Math.min(Math.max(startHeight + (startY - currentY), 150), window.innerHeight - 80) 393 this.element.style.height = newHeight + "px" 394 this.footerHeight = newHeight 395 } 396 397 const onUp = () => { 398 document.removeEventListener("mousemove", onMove) 399 document.removeEventListener("mouseup", onUp) 400 document.removeEventListener("touchmove", onMove) 401 document.removeEventListener("touchend", onUp) 402 sessionStorage.setItem("chatFooterHeight", this.footerHeight) 403 } 404 405 document.addEventListener("mousemove", onMove) 406 document.addEventListener("mouseup", onUp) 407 document.addEventListener("touchmove", onMove) 408 document.addEventListener("touchend", onUp) 409 } 410 411 // --- Internal Helpers --- 412 413 _createCanvasTabButton(canvas) { 414 const tab = document.createElement("button") 415 tab.type = "button" 416 tab.className = "chat-tab" 417 tab.dataset.pageId = canvas.pageId 418 tab.innerHTML = ` 419 ${this.escapeHtml(canvas.title || `Canvas ${canvas.pageId}`)} 420 × 421 ` 422 tab.querySelector(".chat-tab-close").addEventListener("click", (e) => { 423 e.stopPropagation() 424 this.closeCanvas(canvas.pageId) 425 }) 426 tab.addEventListener("click", () => { 427 this.switchCanvas(canvas.pageId) 428 }) 429 this.canvasTabsTarget.appendChild(tab) 430 } 431 432 _createCanvasOverlay(pageId) { 433 const canvasesEl = document.getElementById("conversation-canvases") 434 const canvasId = `canvas-page-${pageId}` 435 if (canvasesEl && !document.getElementById(canvasId)) { 436 const overlay = document.createElement("div") 437 overlay.id = canvasId 438 overlay.className = "conversation-canvas" 439 canvasesEl.appendChild(overlay) 440 this._loadCanvasByPage(pageId, overlay) 441 } 442 } 443 444 _renderConversationTabs() { 445 this._clearConversationTabs() 446 const canvas = this.canvases.find(c => c.pageId === this.activeCanvasPageId) 447 if (!canvas) return 448 449 for (const conv of canvas.conversations) { 450 const tab = document.createElement("button") 451 tab.type = "button" 452 tab.className = "chat-tab" 453 tab.dataset.convId = conv.id 454 if (canvas.activeConvId === conv.id) tab.classList.add("active") 455 tab.innerHTML = ` 456 ${this.escapeHtml(conv.title || `Chat ${conv.id}`)} 457 × 458 ` 459 tab.querySelector(".chat-tab-close").addEventListener("click", (e) => { 460 e.stopPropagation() 461 this.closeConversation(conv.id) 462 }) 463 tab.addEventListener("click", () => { 464 this.switchConversation(conv.id) 465 }) 466 this.conversationTabsTarget.appendChild(tab) 467 } 468 } 469 470 _clearConversationTabs() { 471 this.conversationTabsTarget.innerHTML = "" 472 } 473 474 _activateConversation(convId) { 475 // Update conversation tab highlights 476 this.conversationTabsTarget.querySelectorAll(".chat-tab").forEach(tab => { 477 tab.classList.toggle("active", parseInt(tab.dataset.convId) === convId) 478 }) 479 480 // Update panels 481 this.panelsTarget.querySelectorAll(".chat-panel").forEach(panel => { 482 // Show only panels belonging to the active canvas's conversations 483 const canvas = this.canvases.find(c => c.pageId === this.activeCanvasPageId) 484 const belongsToCanvas = canvas && canvas.conversations.some(cv => cv.id === parseInt(panel.dataset.panelId)) 485 panel.classList.toggle("active", belongsToCanvas && parseInt(panel.dataset.panelId) === convId) 486 }) 487 488 // Scroll messages to bottom 489 const msgs = document.getElementById(`messages-${convId}`) 490 if (msgs) { 491 requestAnimationFrame(() => { msgs.scrollTop = msgs.scrollHeight }) 492 } 493 } 494 495 async _loadPanel(id, panel) { 496 try { 497 const resp = await fetch(`/conversations/${id}/panel`) 498 panel.innerHTML = await resp.text() 499 const msgs = panel.querySelector(`#messages-${id}`) 500 if (msgs) { 501 requestAnimationFrame(() => { msgs.scrollTop = msgs.scrollHeight }) 502 } 503 } catch (e) { 504 panel.innerHTML = `
Failed to load conversation.
` 505 } 506 } 507 508 async _loadCanvasByPage(pageId, container) { 509 try { 510 const resp = await fetch(`/api/pages/${pageId}/canvas`) 511 if (!resp.ok) return 512 513 const data = await resp.json() 514 515 container.innerHTML = ` 516
517
518
100%
519 ` 520 container.setAttribute("data-controller", "canvas") 521 container.setAttribute("data-canvas-page-id-value", pageId) 522 523 // Pass scroll lock state from canvas_state 524 if (data.canvas_state && data.canvas_state.scroll_locked) { 525 container.setAttribute("data-canvas-scroll-locked-value", "true") 526 } 527 528 const world = container.querySelector(".canvas-world") 529 for (const comp of data.components) { 530 world.insertAdjacentHTML("beforeend", this._renderCanvasComponent(comp)) 531 } 532 } catch (e) { 533 console.error("[ChatFooter] Failed to load canvas:", e) 534 } 535 } 536 537 _renderCanvasComponent(comp) { 538 let style = `left:${comp.x}px;top:${comp.y}px;width:${comp.width}px;` 539 if (comp.height) style += `height:${comp.height}px;` 540 const metaJson = JSON.stringify(comp.metadata || {}).replace(/"/g, '"') 541 return `
542
${comp.content || ''}
543
` 544 } 545 546 // --- Restore canvas from saved state --- 547 548 _restoreCanvas(savedCanvas) { 549 const canvas = { 550 pageId: savedCanvas.pageId, 551 title: savedCanvas.title, 552 slug: savedCanvas.slug, 553 conversations: [], 554 activeConvId: savedCanvas.activeConvId 555 } 556 this.canvases.push(canvas) 557 558 this._createCanvasTabButton(canvas) 559 this._createCanvasOverlay(canvas.pageId) 560 561 // Restore conversations 562 for (const conv of (savedCanvas.conversations || [])) { 563 canvas.conversations.push({ id: conv.id, title: conv.title, slug: conv.slug }) 564 565 const panel = document.createElement("div") 566 panel.className = "chat-panel" 567 panel.dataset.panelId = conv.id 568 panel.innerHTML = `
Loading...
` 569 this.panelsTarget.appendChild(panel) 570 this._loadPanel(conv.id, panel) 571 } 572 } 573 574 // --- URL Management --- 575 576 _updateURL() { 577 const canvas = this.canvases.find(c => c.pageId === this.activeCanvasPageId) 578 if (!canvas) { 579 if (location.pathname !== "/") history.pushState(null, "", "/") 580 return 581 } 582 const conv = canvas.conversations.find(c => c.id === canvas.activeConvId) 583 const path = conv ? `/${canvas.slug}/${conv.slug}` : `/${canvas.slug}` 584 if (location.pathname !== path) history.pushState(null, "", path) 585 } 586 587 _handlePopState() { 588 const parts = location.pathname.split("/").filter(Boolean) 589 if (parts.length === 0) { 590 // At root deselect 591 if (this.activeCanvasPageId) { 592 this.activeCanvasPageId = null 593 this.canvasTabsTarget.querySelectorAll(".chat-tab").forEach(t => t.classList.remove("active")) 594 this.conversationTabBarTarget.style.display = "none" 595 this._clearConversationTabs() 596 this.panelsTarget.querySelectorAll(".chat-panel").forEach(p => p.classList.remove("active")) 597 const canvasesEl = document.getElementById("conversation-canvases") 598 if (canvasesEl) canvasesEl.querySelectorAll(".conversation-canvas").forEach(c => c.classList.remove("active")) 599 } 600 return 601 } 602 603 const canvasSlug = parts[0] 604 const chatSlug = parts[1] 605 606 const canvas = this.canvases.find(c => c.slug === canvasSlug) 607 if (canvas) { 608 this.switchCanvas(canvas.pageId) 609 if (chatSlug) { 610 const conv = canvas.conversations.find(c => c.slug === chatSlug) 611 if (conv) this.switchConversation(conv.id) 612 } 613 } 614 } 615 616 // --- Persistence --- 617 618 _saveState() { 619 const state = { 620 canvases: this.canvases.map(c => ({ 621 pageId: c.pageId, 622 title: c.title, 623 slug: c.slug, 624 conversations: c.conversations.map(cv => ({ id: cv.id, title: cv.title, slug: cv.slug })), 625 activeConvId: c.activeConvId 626 })), 627 activeCanvasPageId: this.activeCanvasPageId 628 } 629 sessionStorage.setItem("chatState", JSON.stringify(state)) 630 } 631 632 // --- Utilities --- 633 634 escapeHtml(text) { 635 const div = document.createElement("div") 636 div.textContent = text 637 return div.innerHTML 638 } 639} 640

data.prompt:
Explore the OpenFang codebase thoroughly, focusing on:

1. The canvas system - how components are rendered, positioned, dragged, and managed. Look at all canvas-related JavaScript, ERB views, routes, models, and CSS.
2. The layout system - how the sidebar nav, chat terminal, and main content area are structured
3. The component/card system on the canvas - what types of components exist (pages, etc.)
4. Any context menu implementations
5. The current design system (CSS tokens, card styles, component styles)
6. How pages/content are created and displayed on the canvas

Key files to check: web/app.rb, web/views/layout.erb, web/views/canvas*.erb, web/public/css/style.css, any JS files related to canvas, fang/models/ for canvas-related models, fang/tools/create_page_tool.rb

Be very thorough - read all relevant files completely.

1import { Application } from "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@hotwired/stimulus@3.2.2/dist/stimulus.js"
     2import * as Turbo from "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@hotwired/turbo@8.0.0/dist/turbo.es2017-esm.js"
     3
     4window.Turbo = Turbo
     5
     6const application = Application.start()
     7
     8// Widget behavior registry + built-in widgets
     9import "/js/widgets/registry.js"
    10import "/js/widgets/clock.js"
    11import "/js/widgets/chart.js"
    12import "/js/widgets/data_table.js"
    13
    14// Import controllers
    15import ConversationController from "/js/controllers/conversation_controller.js"
    16import NotificationsController from "/js/controllers/notifications_controller.js"
    17import ScrollAnimationController from "/js/controllers/scroll_animation_controller.js"
    18import ChatFooterController from "/js/controllers/chat_footer_controller.js"
    19import CanvasController from "/js/controllers/canvas_controller.js"
    20application.register("conversation", ConversationController)
    21application.register("notifications", NotificationsController)
    22application.register("scroll-animation", ScrollAnimationController)
    23application.register("chat-footer", ChatFooterController)
    24application.register("canvas", CanvasController)
    25
    26// Close sidebar on Turbo navigation
    27document.addEventListener('turbo:before-visit', () => {
    28  const toggle = document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle');
    29  if (toggle) toggle.checked = false;
    30})
    31

1# frozen_string_literal: true 2 3require 'roda' 4require 'tilt/erubi' 5require 'json' 6require 'pagy' 7require_relative 'turbo_broadcast' 8require_relative 'view_helpers' 9 10module Fang 11 module Web 12 class App < Roda 13 plugin :render, views: File.expand_path('views', __dir__) 14 plugin :public, root: File.expand_path('public', __dir__) 15 plugin :json 16 plugin :halt 17 plugin :all_verbs 18 plugin :symbol_views 19 plugin :streaming 20 21 include Pagy::Method 22 23 # Pagy::Method expects a `params` method 24 def params = request.params 25 26 # Make models and helpers available in views 27 plugin :render_locals, locals: { 28 Conversation: Fang::Conversation, 29 Message: Fang::Message, 30 SkillRecord: Fang::SkillRecord, 31 Config: Fang::Config, 32 Notification: Fang::Notification 33 } 34 35 include ViewHelpers 36 37 def turbo_frame_request? 38 env['HTTP_TURBO_FRAME'] == 'canvas-content' 39 end 40 41 def render_canvas_or_layout(template) 42 if turbo_frame_request? 43 content = render(template) 44 "
#{content}
" 45 else 46 view template 47 end 48 end 49 50 def sse_stream(channel) 51 queue = Thread::Queue.new 52 subscriber = TurboBroadcast.subscribe(channel) { |html| queue.push(html) } 53 54 Fang.logger.info "[SSE] Connection opened for #{channel}" 55 56 response['Content-Type'] = 'text/event-stream' 57 response['Cache-Control'] = 'no-cache' 58 response['X-Accel-Buffering'] = 'no' 59 60 stream(loop: true, callback: proc { 61 Fang.logger.info "[SSE] Connection closed for #{channel}" 62 TurboBroadcast.unsubscribe(channel, subscriber) 63 }) do |out| 64 html = queue.pop(timeout: 30) 65 if html 66 Fang.logger.info "[SSE] Sending event to #{channel} (#{html.length} bytes)" 67 out << "data: #{html.gsub("\n", "\ndata: ")}\n\n" 68 else 69 out << ": heartbeat\n\n" 70 end 71 end 72 end 73 74 route do |r| 75 r.public 76 77 # Root redirect to most recent canvas or show home 78 r.root do 79 recent = Page.published.recent.first 80 if recent 81 r.redirect "/#{recent.slug}" 82 else 83 render_canvas_or_layout(:home) 84 end 85 end 86 87 # Conversations routes (kept for panel loading and messages) 88 r.on 'conversations' do 89 # Individual conversation 90 r.on Integer do |id| 91 @conversation = Conversation.find(id) 92 93 r.is do 94 r.get do 95 @messages = @conversation.messages.chronological 96 render_canvas_or_layout(:conversation_show) 97 end 98 end 99 100 # Chat panel fragment (no layout) 101 r.on 'panel' do 102 r.get do 103 @messages = @conversation.messages.chronological 104 render(:conversation_panel) 105 end 106 end 107 108 # Canvas content 109 r.on 'canvas' do 110 r.get do 111 response['Content-Type'] = 'text/html' 112 if @conversation.page 113 @conversation.page.content.presence || '
Canvas is empty
' 114 else 115 '
Canvas is empty
' 116 end 117 end 118 end 119 120 # Messages for this conversation 121 r.on 'messages' do 122 r.post do 123 content = r.params['content'] 124 125 unless content && !content.strip.empty? 126 r.halt 400, { error: 'Message content required' } 127 end 128 129 message = @conversation.add_message( 130 role: 'user', 131 content: content 132 ) 133 134 Fang::Jobs::AgentExecutorJob.perform_later(message.id) 135 136 if r.params['turbo'] 137 message_html = render_message_html(message) 138 139 response['Content-Type'] = 'text/vnd.turbo-stream.html' 140 turbo_stream('append', "messages-#{@conversation.id}") { message_html } + 141 turbo_stream('replace', 'message-form') do 142 <<~HTML 143 144
145 146 154 155
156 157 HTML 158 end 159 else 160 response.status = 200 161 { status: 'ok' } 162 end 163 end 164 end 165 end 166 end 167 168 # AI Pages (individual page by slug) 169 r.on 'pages', String do |slug| 170 @page = Page.published.find_by!(slug: slug) 171 render_canvas_or_layout(:page_show) 172 end 173 174 # Notifications 175 r.on 'notifications' do 176 # SSE stream 177 r.on 'stream' do 178 r.get do 179 sse_stream('notifications') 180 end 181 end 182 183 # Mark read 184 r.on Integer, 'read' do |id| 185 r.post do 186 notification = Fang::Notification.find(id) 187 notification.mark_read! 188 { status: 'ok' } 189 end 190 end 191 192 # Start chat from notification returns JSON for JS-driven canvas opening 193 r.on Integer, 'chat' do |id| 194 r.post do 195 notification = Fang::Notification.find(id) 196 conversation = notification.start_conversation! 197 notification.mark_read! 198 page = notification.page 199 200 { 201 conversation_id: conversation.id, 202 title: conversation.title, 203 slug: conversation.slug, 204 page_id: page.id, 205 page_title: page.title, 206 page_slug: page.slug 207 } 208 end 209 end 210 end 211 212 # Jobs & Skills canvas page 213 r.on 'jobs' do 214 @page = Page.find_by(slug: 'jobs') 215 r.on String do |chat_slug| 216 @conversation = @page&.conversations&.find_by(slug: chat_slug) 217 render_canvas_or_layout(:canvas_view) 218 end 219 r.is do 220 render_canvas_or_layout(:canvas_view) 221 end 222 end 223 224 # Heartbeats canvas page 225 r.on 'heartbeats' do 226 @page = Page.find_by(slug: 'heartbeats') 227 r.on String do |chat_slug| 228 @conversation = @page&.conversations&.find_by(slug: chat_slug) 229 render_canvas_or_layout(:canvas_view) 230 end 231 r.is do 232 render_canvas_or_layout(:canvas_view) 233 end 234 end 235 236 # Settings canvas page 237 r.on 'settings' do 238 @page = Page.find_by(slug: 'settings') 239 r.on String do |chat_slug| 240 @conversation = @page&.conversations&.find_by(slug: chat_slug) 241 render_canvas_or_layout(:canvas_view) 242 end 243 r.is do 244 render_canvas_or_layout(:canvas_view) 245 end 246 end 247 248 # Webhooks 249 r.on 'webhooks' do 250 r.on 'whatsapp' do 251 r.post do 252 raw_body = r.body.read 253 254 unless Fang::WhatsApp.verify_signature(raw_body, r.env['HTTP_X_WEBHOOK_SIGNATURE']) 255 r.halt 401, { error: 'Invalid signature' } 256 end 257 258 payload = JSON.parse(raw_body) 259 Fang::WhatsApp.handle_inbound(payload) 260 261 { status: 'ok' } 262 end 263 end 264 end 265 266 # Health check 267 r.on 'health' do 268 { status: 'ok', timestamp: Time.now.iso8601 } 269 end 270 271 # API routes 272 r.on 'api' do 273 # Data table pagination endpoint 274 r.on 'tables', Integer, 'rows' do |component_id| 275 r.get do 276 component = Fang::CanvasComponent.find(component_id) 277 widget = Fang::Widgets::DataTableWidget.new(component) 278 279 page = (r.params['page'] || 1).to_i 280 sort_col = r.params['sort'] 281 sort_dir = r.params['dir'] 282 283 # Build filters from query params like filter[status]=pending 284 filters = [] 285 (r.params['filter'] || {}).each do |col, val| 286 filters << { 'column' => col, 'operator' => '=', 'value' => val } 287 end 288 filters = nil if filters.empty? 289 290 rows_html, has_more = widget.render_page(page: page, sort_col: sort_col, sort_dir: sort_dir, filters: filters) 291 cid = component.id 292 293 sentinel = '' 294 if has_more 295 next_page = page + 1 296 src = "/api/tables/#{cid}/rows?page=#{next_page}" 297 src += "&sort=#{Rack::Utils.escape(sort_col)}" if sort_col 298 src += "&dir=#{Rack::Utils.escape(sort_dir)}" if sort_dir 299 (r.params['filter'] || {}).each { |k, v| src += "&filter[#{Rack::Utils.escape(k)}]=#{Rack::Utils.escape(v)}" } 300 sentinel = %() 301 end 302 303 response['Content-Type'] = 'text/html' 304 305 # When frame=body, wrap in the body frame (used for sort reloads) 306 frame_id = if r.params['frame'] == 'body' 307 "data-table-body-#{cid}" 308 else 309 "data-table-page-#{cid}-#{page}" 310 end 311 312 <<~HTML 313 314 #{rows_html} 315 #{sentinel} 316 317 HTML 318 end 319 end 320 r.on 'notifications' do 321 r.is do 322 r.get do 323 pagy, notifications = pagy(Fang::Notification.recent, limit: (r.params['limit'] || 5).to_i.clamp(1, 20), page: (r.params['page'] || 1).to_i) 324 325 html = notifications.map { |n| render_notification_card_html(n) }.join 326 327 { html: html, count: notifications.size, has_more: !pagy.next.nil?, page: pagy.page, pages: pagy.last } 328 end 329 end 330 end 331 332 r.on 'conversations' do 333 r.is do 334 r.get do 335 conversations = Conversation.recent.limit(20).map do |c| 336 { 337 id: c.id, 338 title: c.title, 339 slug: c.slug, 340 source: c.source, 341 page_id: c.page_id, 342 message_count: c.messages.count, 343 last_message_at: c.last_message_at 344 } 345 end 346 { conversations: conversations } 347 end 348 349 r.post do 350 page_id = r.params['page_id'] 351 title = r.params['title'].to_s.strip 352 title = 'New Conversation' if title.empty? 353 conversation = Conversation.create!( 354 title: title, 355 source: 'web', 356 page_id: page_id 357 ) 358 { id: conversation.id, title: conversation.title, slug: conversation.slug, page_id: conversation.page_id } 359 end 360 end 361 end 362 363 # Create canvas (Page + Conversation together) 364 r.on 'canvases' do 365 r.post do 366 page = Page.create!( 367 title: r.params['title'] || 'New Canvas', 368 content: '', 369 status: 'published', 370 published_at: Time.current 371 ) 372 conversation = Conversation.create!( 373 title: page.title, 374 source: 'web', 375 page: page 376 ) 377 { id: conversation.id, title: conversation.title, page_id: page.id, page_slug: page.slug, conv_slug: conversation.slug } 378 end 379 end 380 381 # Action system execute actions from widget buttons 382 r.on 'actions' do 383 r.post do 384 body = JSON.parse(r.body.read) rescue r.params 385 action_type = body['action_type'] 386 387 result = case action_type 388 when 'run_skill' 389 skill = Fang::SkillRecord.find_by(name: body['skill_name']) 390 unless skill 391 r.halt 404, { success: false, error: "Skill '#{body['skill_name']}' not found" } 392 end 393 params = (body['params'] || {}).transform_keys(&:to_sym) 394 output = skill.load_and_execute(**params) 395 skill.increment_usage! 396 { success: true, result: output } 397 398 when 'run_code' 399 code = body['code'] || body['ruby_code'] 400 unless code 401 r.halt 400, { success: false, error: 'Missing code parameter' } 402 end 403 ctx = Object.new 404 Fang.constants.map { |c| Fang.const_get(c) } 405 .select { |c| c.is_a?(Class) && c < ActiveRecord::Base } 406 .each { |model| ctx.define_singleton_method(model.name.demodulize.to_sym) { model } } 407 output = ctx.instance_eval(code) 408 { success: true, result: output.inspect } 409 410 when 'send_message' 411 conv = Fang::Conversation.find(body['conversation_id']) 412 message = conv.add_message(role: 'user', content: body['content']) 413 Fang::Jobs::AgentExecutorJob.perform_later(message.id) 414 { success: true, message_id: message.id } 415 416 when 'refresh_component' 417 component = Fang::CanvasComponent.find(body['component_id']) 418 widget_class = Fang::Widgets::BaseWidget.for_type(component.component_type) 419 if widget_class 420 widget = widget_class.new(component) 421 if widget.refresh_data! 422 turbo = "" \ 423 "" 424 TurboBroadcast.broadcast("canvas:#{component.page_id}", turbo) 425 end 426 { success: true, refreshed: true } 427 else 428 { success: false, error: 'Unknown widget type' } 429 end 430 431 when 'toggle_heartbeat' 432 heartbeat = Fang::Heartbeat.find(body['heartbeat_id']) 433 if heartbeat.enabled? 434 heartbeat.update!(enabled: false, status: 'paused') 435 else 436 heartbeat.update!(enabled: true, status: 'active') 437 end 438 { success: true, enabled: heartbeat.enabled?, status: heartbeat.status } 439 440 else 441 r.halt 400, { success: false, error: "Unknown action_type: #{action_type}" } 442 end 443 444 result 445 rescue => e 446 Fang.logger.error "Action failed: #{e.message}" 447 { success: false, error: e.message } 448 end 449 end 450 451 # Heartbeat toggle 452 r.on 'heartbeats', Integer, 'toggle' do |hb_id| 453 r.post do 454 heartbeat = Fang::Heartbeat.find(hb_id) 455 if heartbeat.enabled? 456 heartbeat.update!(enabled: false, status: 'paused') 457 else 458 heartbeat.update!(enabled: true, status: 'active') 459 end 460 461 # Trigger widget refresh 462 page = heartbeat.page || Page.find_by(slug: 'heartbeats') 463 if page 464 component = page.canvas_components.find_by(component_type: 'heartbeat_monitor') 465 if component 466 widget_class = Fang::Widgets::BaseWidget.for_type('heartbeat_monitor') 467 if widget_class 468 widget = widget_class.new(component) 469 if widget.refresh_data! 470 turbo = "" \ 471 "" 472 TurboBroadcast.broadcast("canvas:#{page.id}", turbo) 473 end 474 end 475 end 476 end 477 478 { success: true, enabled: heartbeat.enabled?, status: heartbeat.status } 479 end 480 end 481 482 # Widget type registry 483 r.on 'widget_types' do 484 r.get do 485 types = Fang::Widgets::BaseWidget.registry.map do |type, klass| 486 { type: type, label: klass.menu_label_text || type.tr('_', ' ').capitalize, 487 icon: klass.menu_icon_text, defaults: klass.default_metadata } 488 end 489 { widget_types: types } 490 end 491 end 492 493 # Page canvas content by page ID 494 r.on 'pages', Integer do |page_id| 495 page = Page.find(page_id) 496 497 # Canvas SSE stream one per canvas 498 r.on 'stream' do 499 r.get do 500 sse_stream("canvas:#{page.id}") 501 end 502 end 503 504 r.on 'canvas' do 505 r.get do 506 components = page.canvas_components.ordered.map do |comp| 507 # Auto-render widget content if stored content is blank 508 if comp.content.blank? 509 rendered = comp.render_content_html 510 comp.update_column(:content, rendered) if rendered.present? 511 end 512 comp.as_canvas_json 513 end 514 { 515 components: components, 516 canvas_state: page.canvas_state || {} 517 } 518 end 519 end 520 521 r.on 'components' do 522 r.is do 523 r.post do 524 raw = r.body.read 525 r.body.rewind 526 body = begin; JSON.parse(raw); rescue; r.params; end 527 comp_type = body['component_type'] || 'card' 528 metadata = body['metadata'] || {} 529 530 # Merge widget default metadata 531 widget_class = Fang::Widgets::BaseWidget.for_type(comp_type) 532 metadata = widget_class.default_metadata.merge(metadata) if widget_class 533 534 component = page.canvas_components.create!( 535 component_type: comp_type, 536 content: body['content'] || '', 537 x: body['x']&.to_f || 0, 538 y: body['y']&.to_f || 0, 539 width: body['width']&.to_f || 320, 540 height: body['height']&.to_f, 541 z_index: body['z_index']&.to_i || 0, 542 metadata: metadata 543 ) 544 545 # Auto-render content from widget if content is blank 546 if component.content.blank? 547 rendered = component.render_content_html 548 component.update_column(:content, rendered) if rendered.present? 549 end 550 551 # Broadcast via canvas channel 552 html = component.render_html 553 turbo = "" 554 TurboBroadcast.broadcast("canvas:#{page.id}", turbo) 555 556 component.as_canvas_json 557 end 558 end 559 560 r.on Integer do |component_id| 561 component = page.canvas_components.find(component_id) 562 563 r.get do 564 component.as_canvas_json 565 end 566 567 r.patch do 568 raw = r.body.read 569 r.body.rewind 570 body = begin; JSON.parse(raw); rescue; r.params; end 571 updates = {} 572 %w[x y width height z_index].each do |attr| 573 updates[attr] = (body[attr] || r.params[attr]).to_f if body[attr] || r.params[attr] 574 end 575 updates[:content] = body['content'] if body.key?('content') 576 if body.key?('metadata') 577 updates[:metadata] = (component.metadata || {}).deep_merge(body['metadata']) 578 end 579 component.update!(updates) if updates.any? 580 component.as_canvas_json 581 end 582 583 r.delete do 584 turbo = "" 585 TurboBroadcast.broadcast("canvas:#{page.id}", turbo) 586 component.destroy! 587 { success: true } 588 end 589 end 590 end 591 end 592 end 593 594 # Canvas URL: /:canvas_slug or /:canvas_slug/:chat_slug 595 # This MUST be last it's a catch-all for slug-based routes 596 r.on String do |canvas_slug| 597 @page = Page.find_by(slug: canvas_slug) 598 next unless @page 599 600 r.on String do |chat_slug| 601 @conversation = @page.conversations.find_by(slug: chat_slug) 602 render_canvas_or_layout(:canvas_view) 603 end 604 605 r.is do 606 render_canvas_or_layout(:canvas_view) 607 end 608 end 609 end 610 end 611 end 612end 613

1# frozen_string_literal: true
     2
     3module Fang
     4  class Page < ActiveRecord::Base
     5    self.table_name = 'pages'
     6
     7    include HasStatus
     8
     9    # Validations
    10    validates :title, presence: true
    11    validates :slug, presence: true, uniqueness: true
    12    validates :content, length: { maximum: 1_000_000 }, allow_blank: true
    13    validates :status, presence: true, inclusion: { in: %w[draft published archived] }
    14
    15    has_many :conversations, foreign_key: :page_id, dependent: :nullify
    16    has_many :canvas_components, dependent: :destroy
    17
    18    # Statuses
    19    statuses :draft, :published, :archived
    20    scope :recent, -> { order(created_at: :desc) }
    21
    22    # Callbacks
    23    before_validation :generate_slug, if: -> { slug.blank? }
    24
    25    # Methods
    26    def publish!
    27      update!(status: 'published', published_at: Time.current)
    28    end
    29
    30    def archive!
    31      update!(status: 'archived')
    32    end
    33
    34    private
    35
    36    def generate_slug
    37      return unless title.present?
    38
    39      base_slug = title.parameterize
    40      self.slug = base_slug
    41
    42      counter = 1
    43      while Page.exists?(slug: slug)
    44        self.slug = "#{base_slug}-#{counter}"
    45        counter += 1
    46      end
    47    end
    48  end
    49end
    50

1# frozen_string_literal: true
     2
     3module Fang
     4  module Tools
     5    class CreatePageTool < FastMcp::Tool
     6      tool_name 'create_page'
     7      description 'Create a web page that appears in the sidebar navigation'
     8
     9      arguments do
    10        required(:title).filled(:string).description('Page title (also generates the URL slug)')
    11        required(:content).filled(:string).description('HTML content for the page body')
    12        optional(:status).filled(:string).description('Page status: published (default), draft, or archived')
    13      end
    14
    15      def call(title:, content:, status: 'published')
    16        page = Page.create!(
    17          title: title,
    18          content: content,
    19          status: status,
    20          published_at: status == 'published' ? Time.current : nil
    21        )
    22
    23        # Link to current conversation if available
    24        if ENV['CONVERSATION_ID']
    25          conversation = Fang::Conversation.find_by(id: ENV['CONVERSATION_ID'])
    26          conversation&.update!(page: page) if conversation && conversation.page_id.nil?
    27        end
    28
    29        Fang.logger.info "Created page '#{page.title}' at /pages/#{page.slug}"
    30
    31        {
    32          success: true,
    33          page_id: page.id,
    34          title: page.title,
    35          slug: page.slug,
    36          url: "/pages/#{page.slug}",
    37          status: page.status
    38        }
    39      rescue => e
    40        Fang.logger.error "Failed to create page: #{e.message}"
    41        { success: false, error: e.message }
    42      end
    43    end
    44  end
    45end
    46

1registerWidget('data_table', {
     2  init(el, metadata) {
     3    const table = el.querySelector('table.data-table')
     4    if (!table) return
     5    const cid = table.dataset.componentId
     6
     7    // Sort: click sortable headers
     8    table.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
     9      const th = e.target.closest('th[data-sortable="true"]')
    10      if (!th) return
    11
    12      const col = th.dataset.col
    13      const isAsc = th.classList.contains('sort-asc')
    14      const dir = isAsc ? 'desc' : 'asc'
    15
    16      // Update header classes
    17      table.querySelectorAll('th').forEach(h => h.classList.remove('sort-asc', 'sort-desc'))
    18      th.classList.add(`sort-${dir}`)
    19
    20      // Reload body frame with new sort
    21      const bodyFrame = el.querySelector(`#data-table-body-${cid}`)
    22      if (bodyFrame) {
    23        bodyFrame.src = `/api/tables/${cid}/rows?page=1&sort=${encodeURIComponent(col)}&dir=${dir}&frame=body`
    24      }
    25    })
    26
    27    // Resize: mousedown on handle
    28    table.addEventListener('mousedown', (e) => {
    29      const handle = e.target.closest('.col-resize-handle')
    30      if (!handle) return
    31      e.preventDefault()
    32
    33      const th = handle.parentElement
    34      const colIndex = Array.from(th.parentElement.children).indexOf(th)
    35      const col = table.querySelector(`colgroup`).children[colIndex]
    36      if (!col) return
    37
    38      const startX = e.clientX
    39      const startWidth = th.offsetWidth
    40
    41      const onMove = (me) => {
    42        const newWidth = Math.max(50, startWidth + me.clientX - startX)
    43        col.style.width = `${newWidth}px`
    44      }
    45
    46      const onUp = () => {
    47        document.removeEventListener('mousemove', onMove)
    48        document.removeEventListener('mouseup', onUp)
    49
    50        // Persist widths
    51        const widths = Array.from(table.querySelectorAll('colgroup col')).map(c => parseInt(c.style.width) || 150)
    52        const columns = (metadata.columns || []).map((c, i) => ({ ...c, width: widths[i] || c.width }))
    53        const pageId = el.closest('[data-page-id]')?.dataset.pageId ||
    54                       el.closest('.conversation-canvas')?.dataset.pageId
    55        if (pageId) {
    56          fetch(`/api/pages/${pageId}/components/${cid}`, {
    57            method: 'PATCH',
    58            headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
    59            body: JSON.stringify({ metadata: { columns } })
    60          })
    61        }
    62      }
    63
    64      document.addEventListener('mousemove', onMove)
    65      document.addEventListener('mouseup', onUp)
    66    })
    67
    68    // Scroll reset on body frame reload
    69    const scroll = el.querySelector('.data-table-scroll')
    70    if (scroll) {
    71      document.addEventListener('turbo:frame-load', (e) => {
    72        if (e.target.id === `data-table-body-${cid}`) {
    73          scroll.scrollTop = 0
    74        }
    75      })
    76    }
    77  },
    78
    79  destroy(el) {
    80    // No persistent intervals to clean up
    81  }
    82})
    83

content.content: 1// fang-components.js Client-side component library for rich widgets 2// Provides: chart rendering, sortable tables, action buttons, auto-init via MutationObserver 3 4window.Fang = window.Fang || {} 5 6// --- Chart Rendering (wraps Chart.js) --- 7 8Fang.renderChart = function(el, config) { 9 if (typeof Chart === 'undefined') { 10 console.warn('[Fang] Chart.js not loaded, skipping chart render') 11 return null 12 } 13 14 // Destroy existing chart on this canvas if any 15 const existing = Chart.getChart(el) 16 if (existing) existing.destroy() 17 18 // Apply theme defaults 19 const defaults = { 20 color: getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).getPropertyValue('--muted-foreground').trim() || '#a1a1aa', 21 borderColor: getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).getPropertyValue('--border').trim() || '#27272a' 22 } 23 24 const mergedOptions = Object.assign({ 25 responsive: true, 26 maintainAspectRatio: false, 27 plugins: { 28 legend: { labels: { color: defaults.color } } 29 }, 30 scales: {} 31 }, config.options || {}) 32 33 // Apply theme colors to scales if not already set 34 if (config.type !== 'pie' && config.type !== 'doughnut' && config.type !== 'polarArea') { 35 if (!mergedOptions.scales.x) mergedOptions.scales.x = {} 36 if (!mergedOptions.scales.y) mergedOptions.scales.y = {} 37 mergedOptions.scales.x.ticks = Object.assign({ color: defaults.color }, mergedOptions.scales.x.ticks || {}) 38 mergedOptions.scales.x.grid = Object.assign({ color: defaults.borderColor }, mergedOptions.scales.x.grid || {}) 39 mergedOptions.scales.y.ticks = Object.assign({ color: defaults.color }, mergedOptions.scales.y.ticks || {}) 40 mergedOptions.scales.y.grid = Object.assign({ color: defaults.borderColor }, mergedOptions.scales.y.grid || {}) 41 } 42 43 return new Chart(el, { 44 type: config.type || 'bar', 45 data: { 46 labels: config.labels || [], 47 datasets: (config.datasets || []).map(ds => Object.assign({ 48 borderWidth: 1 49 }, ds)) 50 }, 51 options: mergedOptions 52 }) 53} 54 55// --- Sortable Tables --- 56 57function initSortableTable(table) { 58 if (table._fangSortable) return 59 table._fangSortable = true 60 61 const headers = table.querySelectorAll('th') 62 headers.forEach((th, colIndex) => { 63 th.style.cursor = 'pointer' 64 th.style.userSelect = 'none' 65 th.addEventListener('click', () => sortTable(table, colIndex, th)) 66 }) 67} 68 69function sortTable(table, colIndex, th) { 70 const tbody = table.querySelector('tbody') || table 71 const rows = Array.from(tbody.querySelectorAll('tr')) 72 const isAsc = th.dataset.sortDir !== 'asc' 73 74 // Clear sort indicators on all headers 75 table.querySelectorAll('th').forEach(h => { 76 h.dataset.sortDir = '' 77 h.classList.remove('sort-asc', 'sort-desc') 78 }) 79 80 th.dataset.sortDir = isAsc ? 'asc' : 'desc' 81 th.classList.add(isAsc ? 'sort-asc' : 'sort-desc') 82 83 rows.sort((a, b) => { 84 const aText = (a.children[colIndex]?.textContent || '').trim() 85 const bText = (b.children[colIndex]?.textContent || '').trim() 86 const aNum = parseFloat(aText) 87 const bNum = parseFloat(bText) 88 89 // Numeric sort if both are numbers 90 if (!isNaN(aNum) && !isNaN(bNum)) { 91 return isAsc ? aNum - bNum : bNum - aNum 92 } 93 return isAsc ? aText.localeCompare(bText) : bText.localeCompare(aText) 94 }) 95 96 rows.forEach(row => tbody.appendChild(row)) 97} 98 99// --- Action Buttons --- 100 101function initActionButton(btn) { 102 if (btn._fangAction) return 103 btn._fangAction = true 104 105 btn.addEventListener('click', async (e) => { 106 e.preventDefault() 107 if (btn.disabled) return 108 109 let actionConfig 110 try { 111 actionConfig = JSON.parse(btn.dataset.fangAction) 112 } catch (err) { 113 console.error('[Fang] Invalid action config:', err) 114 return 115 } 116 117 // Loading state 118 const originalText = btn.innerHTML 119 btn.disabled = true 120 btn.classList.add('fang-action-loading') 121 btn.innerHTML = ' ' + (btn.dataset.loadingText || 'Working...') 122 123 try { 124 const resp = await fetch('/api/actions', { 125 method: 'POST', 126 headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, 127 body: JSON.stringify(actionConfig) 128 }) 129 const data = await resp.json() 130 131 if (data.success) { 132 btn.classList.add('fang-action-success') 133 btn.innerHTML = btn.dataset.successText || 'Done' 134 setTimeout(() => { 135 btn.classList.remove('fang-action-success') 136 btn.innerHTML = originalText 137 btn.disabled = false 138 }, 2000) 139 } else { 140 btn.classList.add('fang-action-error') 141 btn.innerHTML = data.error || 'Failed' 142 setTimeout(() => { 143 btn.classList.remove('fang-action-error') 144 btn.innerHTML = originalText 145 btn.disabled = false 146 }, 3000) 147 } 148 } catch (err) { 149 console.error('[Fang] Action failed:', err) 150 btn.innerHTML = 'Error' 151 setTimeout(() => { 152 btn.innerHTML = originalText 153 btn.disabled = false 154 }, 3000) 155 } finally { 156 btn.classList.remove('fang-action-loading') 157 } 158 }) 159} 160 161// --- Auto-initialization --- 162 163function initFangElements(root) { 164 // Sortable tables 165 root.querySelectorAll('[data-fang-table]').forEach(initSortableTable) 166 167 // Action buttons 168 root.querySelectorAll('[data-fang-action]').forEach(initActionButton) 169 170 // Charts (initialized by widget JS, but handle standalone data-fang-chart too) 171 root.querySelectorAll('[data-fang-chart]').forEach(el => { 172 if (el._fangChart) return 173 try { 174 const config = JSON.parse(el.dataset.fangChart) 175 const canvas = el.querySelector('canvas') || el 176 if (canvas.tagName === 'CANVAS') { 177 el._fangChart = Fang.renderChart(canvas, config) 178 } 179 } catch (err) { 180 console.error('[Fang] Chart auto-init failed:', err) 181 } 182 }) 183} 184 185// Init on page load 186document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => initFangElements(document)) 187 188// MutationObserver for Turbo Stream inserts 189const fangObserver = new MutationObserver((mutations) => { 190 for (const mutation of mutations) { 191 for (const node of mutation.addedNodes) { 192 if (node.nodeType === Node.ELEMENT_NODE) { 193 initFangElements(node) 194 } 195 } 196 } 197}) 198fangObserver.observe(document.body, { childList: true, subtree: true }) 199

1# frozen_string_literal: true 2 3module Fang 4 module Widgets 5 class BaseWidget 6 class << self 7 attr_reader :widget_type_name, :menu_label_text, :menu_icon_text 8 9 def widget_type(name) = @widget_type_name = name.to_s 10 def menu_label(label) = @menu_label_text = label 11 def menu_icon(icon) = @menu_icon_text = icon 12 def refreshable? = false 13 def refresh_interval = nil 14 def default_metadata = {} 15 16 def registry 17 @registry ||= ObjectSpace.each_object(Class) 18 .select { |c| c < BaseWidget && c.widget_type_name } 19 .each_with_object({}) { |c, h| h[c.widget_type_name] = c } 20 end 21 22 def reset_registry! = @registry = nil 23 def for_type(type) = registry[type.to_s] 24 end 25 26 def initialize(component) 27 @component = component 28 @metadata = component.metadata || {} 29 end 30 31 def render_content 32 @component.content || '' 33 end 34 35 def render_component_html 36 c = @component 37 style = "left:#{c.x}px;top:#{c.y}px;width:#{c.width}px;" 38 style += "height:#{c.height}px;" if c.height 39 meta_json = (@metadata || {}).to_json.gsub('"', '"') 40 <<~HTML 41
45
#{render_content}
46
47 HTML 48 end 49 50 def refresh_data! 51 false 52 end 53 54 private 55 56 def evaluate_data_source 57 source = @metadata['data_source'] 58 return nil unless source.is_a?(String) && !source.empty? 59 60 ctx = Object.new 61 Fang.constants.map { |c| Fang.const_get(c) } 62 .select { |c| c.is_a?(Class) && c < ActiveRecord::Base } 63 .each { |model| ctx.define_singleton_method(model.name.demodulize.to_sym) { model } } 64 ctx.instance_eval(source) 65 rescue => e 66 Fang.logger.error "Data source evaluation failed: #{e.message}" 67 nil 68 end 69 70 def h(text) 71 Rack::Utils.escape_html(text.to_s) 72 end 73 end 74 end 75end 76
